sqlMap.sql: ,#stoImgPath# || C.FOLDER_NAM || '/' || SUBSTR(F.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(F.ZONE_CODE, 8, 4) || '/' || DECODE(substr(G.ORIGIN, 1, 1), '중', 'cent', '서', 'west', '동', 'east', 'esea') || '/' || SUBSTR(F.MAP5000_NUM, 1, 5) || '/' || B.FILE_NAM || '.' || B.FILE_FORMAT FILE_PATH ,C.FOLDER_NAM|| '/'||SUBSTR(F.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/'||SUBSTR(F.ZONE_CODE, 8, 4) || '/'||DECODE(substr(G.ORIGIN, 1, 1), '중', 'cent', '서', 'west', '동', 'east', 'esea') || '/'||SUBSTR(F.MAP5000_NUM, 1,5) || '/'||B.FILE_NAM||'.' || 'jpg' NIX_PATH

,#stoImgPath# || C.FOLDER_NAM || '/' || SUBSTR(H.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(H.ZONE_CODE, 8, 4) || '/' || DECODE(substr(F.ORIGIN, 1, 1), '중', 'cent', '서', 'west', '동', 'east', 'esea') || '/' || SUBSTR(H.MAP5000_NUM, 1, 5) || '/' || B.FILE_NAM || '.' || B.FILE_FORMAT FILE_PATH, C.FOLDER_NAM || '/' || SUBSTR(H.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(H.ZONE_CODE, 8, 4) || '/' || DECODE(substr(F.ORIGIN, 1, 1), '중', 'cent', '서', 'west', '동', 'east', 'esea') || '/' || SUBSTR(H.MAP5000_NUM, 1, 5) || '/' || B.FILE_NAM || '.' || 'jpg' NIX_PATH

, (TRIM(D.STO_DRV) || ':/' || C.FOLDER_NAM || '/' || 'ORTHO' || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(TRIM(A.MAP5000_NUM), 1, 5) || '/' || B.FILE_NAM) AS FILE_PATH , (TRIM(D.STO_DRV) || ':/' || C.FOLDER_NAM || '/' || 'ORTHO' || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(TRIM(A.MAP5000_NUM), 1, 5) || '/' || B.FILE_NAM || '.' || B.FILE_FORMAT) AS NIX_PATH

, (TRIM(D.STO_DRV) || ':/' || C.FOLDER_NAM || '/' || 'TIFF' || '/' || (SELECT CDE_NAM FROM CMT_DETAIL_CODE_NIIM WHERE FLE_IDN = 'SEC_FOLDER_CDE' AND CDE_CDE = G.SECURITY_CDE) || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 8, 11) || '/' || A.PH_COURSE || '/' || B.FILE_NAM) AS FILE_PATH , (TRIM(D.STO_DRV) || ':/' || C.FOLDER_NAM || '/' || 'NIX/LSS' || '/' || (SELECT CDE_NAM FROM CMT_DETAIL_CODE_NIIM WHERE FLE_IDN = 'SEC_FOLDER_CDE' AND CDE_CDE = G.SECURITY_CDE) || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 8, 11) || '/' || A.PH_COURSE || '/' || B.FILE_NAM) AS NIX_PATH

, (TRIM(D.STO_DRV) || ':/' || C.FOLDER_NAM
|| '/' || (SELECT CDE_CDE FROM CMT_DETAIL_CODE_NIIM WHERE FLE_IDN = 'UTL3D_TYPE' AND CDE_NAM = A.UTL3D_TYPE) || '/' || 'AFTINT' || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 8, 11) || '/' || B.FILE_NAM) AS FILE_PATH , (TRIM(D.STO_DRV) || ':/' || C.FOLDER_NAM
|| '/' || (SELECT CDE_CDE FROM CMT_DETAIL_CODE_NIIM WHERE FLE_IDN = 'UTL3D_TYPE' AND CDE_NAM = A.UTL3D_TYPE) || '/' || 'AFTINT' || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 8, 11) || '/' || B.FILE_NAM || '.' || B.FILE_FORMAT) AS NIX_PATH

, ('/' || C.FOLDER_NAM || '/' || 'TIFF' || '/' || (SELECT CDE_NAM FROM CMT_DETAIL_CODE_NIIM WHERE FLE_IDN = 'SEC_FOLDER_CDE' AND CDE_CDE = G.SECURITY_CDE) || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(A.ZONE_CODE, 8, 11) || '/' || A.PH_COURSE || '/' ) AS FILE_PATH , (B.FILE_NAM || '.' || B.FILE_FORMAT) AS FILE_NAME

, C.FOLDER_NAM || '/' || SUBSTR(F.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(F.ZONE_CODE, 8, 4) || '/' || DECODE(SUBSTR(F.ORIGIN,1,1), '중', 'cent', '서', 'west', '동', 'east', 'esea') || '/' || SUBSTR(F.MAP5000_NUM, 1, 5) || '/' FILE_PATH , (B.FILE_NAM || '.' || B.FILE_FORMAT) AS FILE_NAME

, C.FOLDER_NAM || '/' || SUBSTR(H.ZONE_CODE, 1, 4) || '/' || SUBSTR(H.ZONE_CODE, 8, 4) || '/' || DECODE(SUBSTR(H.ORIGIN,1,1), '중', 'cent', '서', 'west', '동', 'east', 'esea') || '/' || SUBSTR(TRIM(H.MAP5000_NUM), 1, 5) || '/' FILE_PATH , (B.FILE_NAM || '.' || B.FILE_FORMAT) AS FILE_NAME
